info.title: Orthoplex API
info.description: A Laravel 12 multi-tenant SaaS API with comprehensive authentication, RBAC, and user management.

post.description: Login for central application administrators

get.description: Get details of the authenticated central user

post.description: Logout from central application
Refresh the JWT token for central users

get.description: Get comprehensive system health status
Get system configuration and environment info
Get system performance and usage metrics

post.description: Clear application caches

get.description: Get paginated list of all tenants in the system (central app)

post.description: Create a new tenant with subdomain and database

manager_name.description: Admin email for the tenant manager

get.description: Get tenant details and statistics

delete.description: Delete a tenant and all its data

get.description: Get system-wide tenant statistics
Get comprehensive login analytics including totals, trends, and distributions
Get security-focused analytics including failed login attempts, suspicious activity
Get user-focused analytics including activity patterns, device usage

post.description: Create a new user account and return JWT token
Send a new email verification notification to the user

get.description: Verify the user's email address using the verification link
Check if the current user's email is verified

post.description: Request a complete export of user data for GDPR compliance

get.description: Check the status of a data export request
Download the exported data file

post.description: Request deletion of user account and all associated data

delete.description: Cancel a pending account deletion request

post.description: Send a magic login link to the user's email address

message.example: Magic link sent to your email address

get.description: Verify magic login link and authenticate user

post.description: Enable two-factor authentication and generate QR code
Verify TOTP code and enable 2FA
Disable two-factor authentication

get.description: Check if 2FA is enabled for the current user

post.description: Generate new recovery codes (invalidates old ones)
Verify TOTP or recovery code during login

get.description: Get paginated list of users with RSQL filtering, cursor pagination, and advanced sorting

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Global text search across name and email

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort fields (comma-separated, prefix with - for desc)

post.description: Create a new user account

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific user

delete.description: Soft delete a user (can be restored)

post.description: Restore a soft-deleted user

get.description: Get users who haven't logged in within the specified time window
Get users ordered by login count within time window
Get paginated list of webhooks with advanced filtering

post.description: Create a new webhook endpoint

get.description: Get webhook details by ID

post.description: Send a test payload to webhook endpoint

get.description: Get delivery history for a webhook
Get list of available webhook events

post.description: Generate a new HMAC secret for webhook
